mapper.select: SELECT MATNR, MTART, MEINS, MATKL, BISMT, PRDHA, SPART, MSTAE, WRKST, ZEINR, TAKLV, BSTME, XCHPF, EKWSL, MHDHB, ZLABNO, ZPROD_ABBR, CRT_DS, UDT_DS FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA
SELECT MATNR, MTART, MEINS, MATKL, BISMT, PRDHA, SPART, MSTAE, WRKST, ZEINR, TAKLV, BSTME, XCHPF, EKWSL, MHDHB, ZLABNO, ZPROD_ABBR, CRT_DS, UDT_DS FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA WHERE MATNR = #{matnr}

SELECT MATNR, MTART, MEINS, MATKL, BISMT, PRDHA, SPART, MSTAE, WRKST, ZEINR, TAKLV, BSTME, XCHPF, EKWSL, MHDHB, ZLABNO, ZPROD_ABBR, CRT_DS, UDT_DS FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA WHERE MATNR IN
#{item.matnr}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MS_SAP_MTR_MARA (MATNR, MTART, MEINS, MATKL, BISMT, PRDHA, SPART, MSTAE, WRKST, ZEINR, TAKLV, BSTME, XCHPF, EKWSL, MHDHB, ZLABNO, ZPROD_ABBR, CRT_DS, UDT_DS) VALUES (#{matnr}, #{mtart}, #{meins}, #{matkl}, #{bismt}, #{prdha}, #{spart}, #{mstae}, #{wrkst}, #{zeinr}, #{taklv}, #{bstme}, #{xchpf}, #{ekwsl}, #{mhdhb}, #{zlabno}, #{zprodAbbr}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE MS_SAP_MTR_MARA SET MTART = #{mtart}, MEINS = #{meins}, MATKL = #{matkl}, BISMT = #{bismt}, PRDHA = #{prdha}, SPART = #{spart}, MSTAE = #{mstae}, WRKST = #{wrkst}, ZEINR = #{zeinr}, TAKLV = #{taklv}, BSTME = #{bstme}, XCHPF = #{xchpf}, EKWSL = #{ekwsl}, MHDHB = #{mhdhb}, ZLABNO = #{zlabno}, ZPROD_ABBR = #{zprodAbbr}, UDT_DS = SYSDATE WHERE MATNR = #{matnr}
mapper.select: SELECT WERKS, MATNR, LADGR, MMSTA, EKGRP, INSMK, DISMM, FXHOR, DISPO, DISLS, BSTRF, BSTMI, BESKZ, SOBSL, LGPRO, LGFSB, PLIFZ, WEBAZ, ELSLO, STRGR, MTVFP, FEVOR, KZECH, AWSLS, PRCTR, LOSGR, SOBSK, FVIDK, ZFIRST_GI_DATE, CRT_DS, UDT_DS FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARC

SELECT WERKS, MATNR, LADGR, MMSTA, EKGRP, INSMK, DISMM, FXHOR, DISPO, DISLS, BSTRF, BSTMI, BESKZ, SOBSL, LGPRO, LGFSB, PLIFZ, WEBAZ, ELSLO, STRGR, MTVFP, FEVOR, KZECH, AWSLS, PRCTR, LOSGR, SOBSK, FVIDK, ZFIRST_GI_DATE, CRT_DS, UDT_DS FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARC WHERE MATNR = #{matnr} AND WERKS = #{werks}

SELECT WERKS, MATNR, LADGR, MMSTA, EKGRP, INSMK, DISMM, FXHOR, DISPO, DISLS, BSTRF, BSTMI, BESKZ, SOBSL, LGPRO, LGFSB, PLIFZ, WEBAZ, ELSLO, STRGR, MTVFP, FEVOR, KZECH, AWSLS, PRCTR, LOSGR, SOBSK, FVIDK, ZFIRST_GI_DATE, CRT_DS, UDT_DS FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARC WHERE MATNR = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MS_SAP_MTR_MARC (WERKS, MATNR, LADGR, MMSTA, EKGRP, INSMK, DISMM, FXHOR, DISPO, DISLS, BSTRF, BSTMI, BESKZ, SOBSL, LGPRO, LGFSB, PLIFZ, WEBAZ, ELSLO, STRGR, MTVFP, FEVOR, KZECH, AWSLS, PRCTR, LOSGR, SOBSK, FVIDK, ZFIRST_GI_DATE, CRT_DS, UDT_DS) VALUES (#{werks}, #{matnr}, #{ladgr}, #{mmsta}, #{ekgrp}, #{insmk}, #{dismm}, #{fxhor}, #{dispo}, #{disls}, #{bstrf}, #{bstmi}, #{beskz}, #{sobsl}, #{lgpro}, #{lgfsb}, #{plifz}, #{webaz}, #{elslo}, #{strgr}, #{mtvfp}, #{fevor}, #{kzech}, #{awsls}, #{prctr}, #{losgr}, #{sobsk}, #{fvidk}, #{zfirstGiDate}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE MS_SAP_MTR_MARC SET LADGR = #{ladgr}, MMSTA = #{mmsta}, EKGRP = #{ekgrp}, INSMK = #{insmk}, DISMM = #{dismm}, FXHOR = #{fxhor}, DISPO = #{dispo}, DISLS = #{disls}, BSTRF = #{bstrf}, BSTMI = #{bstmi}, BESKZ = #{beskz}, SOBSL = #{sobsl}, LGPRO = #{lgpro}, LGFSB = #{lgfsb}, PLIFZ = #{plifz}, WEBAZ = #{webaz}, ELSLO = #{elslo}, STRGR = #{strgr}, MTVFP = #{mtvfp}, FEVOR = #{fevor}, KZECH = #{kzech}, AWSLS = #{awsls}, PRCTR = #{prctr}, LOSGR = #{losgr}, SOBSK = #{sobsk}, FVIDK = #{fvidk}, ZFIRST_GI_DATE = #{zfirstGiDate}, UDT_DS = SYSDATE WHERE WERKS = #{werks} AND MATNR = #{matnr}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MS_SAP_MTR_MVKE (MATNR, VKORG, VTWEG, DWERK, AUMNG, KTGRM, CRT_DS, UDT_DS) VALUES (#{matnr}, #{vkorg}, #{vtweg}, #{dwerk}, #{aumng}, #{ktgrm}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT MATNR, CLASS_TYPE, CLAZZ, CHAR_CODE, CHAR_DATA_TYP, CHAR_VAL_CHAR, CHAR_VAL_NUM, CRT_DS, UDT_DS FROM MS_SAP_MTR_ZMDV WHERE MATNR = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MS_SAP_MTR_ZMDV (MATNR, CLASS_TYPE, CLAZZ, CHAR_CODE, CHAR_DATA_TYP, CHAR_VAL_CHAR, CHAR_VAL_NUM, CRT_DS, UDT_DS) VALUES (#{matnr}, #{classType}, #{clazz}, #{charCode}, #{charDataTyp}, #{charValChar}, #{charValNum}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO MS_SAP_MTR_MAKT (MATNR, SPRAS, MAKTX, CRT_DS, UDT_DS) VALUES (#{matnr}, #{spras}, #{maktx}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO MS_SAP_BOM (POSNR, STLAL, WERKS, MATNR, MAKTX, MTART, NAME1, DISPO, DSNAM, STKTX, BMENG, BMEIN, VALID_FROM, VALID_TO, STLNR, ZTEXT, LKENZ, STLST, POSTP, PTEXT, IDNRK, IDNRK_MAKT, POTX1, MENGE, MEINS, FMNGE, BEIKZ, CRT_DS, UDT_DS) VALUES (#{posnr}, #{stlal}, #{werks}, #{matnr}, #{maktx}, #{mtart}, #{name1}, #{dispo}, #{dsnam}, #{stktx}, #{bmeng}, #{bmein}, #{validFrom}, #{validTo}, #{stlnr}, #{ztext}, #{lkenz}, #{stlst}, #{postp}, #{ptext}, #{idnrk}, #{idnrkMakt}, #{potx1}, #{menge}, #{meins}, #{fmnge}, #{beikz}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CHAR_CODE, CHAR_VAL_CHAR, CHAR_VAL_NUM, CHAR_CODE_DESC, CHAR_DATA_TYPE, CHAR_VAL_DESC, CRT_DS, IF_INFO_IDX FROM MS_SAP_CHAT_CABN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MS_SAP_CHAT_CABN (CHAR_CODE, CHAR_VAL_CHAR, CHAR_VAL_NUM, CHAR_CODE_DESC, CHAR_DATA_TYPE, CHAR_VAL_DESC, CRT_DS, IF_INFO_IDX) VALUES (#{charCode}, #{charValChar}, #{charValNum}, #{charCodeDesc}, #{charDataType}, #{charValDesc}, SYSDATE, #{ifInfoIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT CLASS_TYPE, CLAZZ, CHAR_CODE, CLASS_NAME, CRT_DS, IF_INFO_IDX FROM MS_SAP_CHAT_KSML
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MS_SAP_CHAT_KSML (CLASS_TYPE, CLAZZ, CHAR_CODE, CLASS_NAME, CRT_DS, IF_INFO_IDX) VALUES (#{classType}, #{clazz}, #{charCode}, #{className}, SYSDATE, #{ifInfoIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT PLNT_CD AS WERKS, MTR_CD AS MATNR, BATCH_NO AS CHARG, LOT_NO, MTR_NM AS MAKTX, MRP_MNG AS DISPO, PHS_ORDER_NO AS EBELN, PHS_ORDER_ITM AS EBELP, PDT_ORDER_NO AS AUFNR, BWART, ERFMG, ERFME, LGORT, BUDAT, ZEXFIELD1, ZEXFIELD2, ZEXFIELD3, ZEXFIELD4, ZEXFIELD5 FROM MS_SAP_INP_PFA
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MS_SAP_INP_PFA (PLNT_CD, MTR_CD, BATCH_NO, LOT_NO, MTR_NM, MRP_MNG, PHS_ORDER_NO, PHS_ORDER_ITM, PDT_ORDER_NO, BWART, ERFMG, ERFME, LGORT, BUDAT, ZEXFIELD1, ZEXFIELD2, ZEXFIELD3, ZEXFIELD4, ZEXFIELD5) VALUES (#{werks}, #{matnr}, #{charg}, #{lotNo}, #{maktx}, #{dispo}, #{ebeln}, #{ebelp}, #{aufnr}, #{bwart}, #{erfmg}, #{erfme}, #{lgort}, #{budat}, #{zexfield1}, #{zexfield2}, #{zexfield3}, #{zexfield4}, #{zexfield5})
mapper.update: UPDATE MS_SAP_INP_PFA SET LOT_NO = #{lotNo}, MTR_NM = #{maktx}, MRP_MNG = #{dispo}, PHS_ORDER_NO = #{ebeln}, PHS_ORDER_ITM = #{ebelp}, PDT_ORDER_NO = #{aufnr}, BWART = #{bwart}, ERFMG = #{erfmg}, ERFME = #{erfme}, LGORT = #{lgort}, BUDAT = #{budat}, ZEXFIELD1 = #{zexfield1}, ZEXFIELD2 = #{zexfield2}, ZEXFIELD3 = #{zexfield3}, ZEXFIELD4 = #{zexfield4}, ZEXFIELD5 = #{zexfield5} WHERE PLNT_CD = #{werks} AND MTR_CD = #{matnr} AND BATCH_NO = #{charg}
mapper.select: SELECT PLNT_CD AS WERKS, MTR_CD AS MATNR, BATCH_NO AS CHARG, INP_MTR_CD AS MATNR_INPUT, INP_BATCH_NO AS CHARG_INPUT, LOT_NO, MTR_NM AS MAKTX, MRP_MNG AS DISPO, PHS_ORDER_NO AS EBELN, PHS_ORDER_ITM AS EBELP, PDT_ORDER_NO AS AUFNR, BWART, ERFMG, ERFME, LGORT, ZEXFIELD1, ZEXFIELD2, ZEXFIELD3, ZEXFIELD4, ZEXFIELD5 FROM MS_SAP_INP_PFA_DTL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MS_SAP_INP_PFA_DTL (PLNT_CD, MTR_CD, BATCH_NO, INP_MTR_CD, INP_BATCH_NO, LOT_NO, MTR_NM, MRP_MNG, PHS_ORDER_NO, PHS_ORDER_ITM, PDT_ORDER_NO, BWART, ERFMG, ERFME, LGORT, ZEXFIELD1, ZEXFIELD2, ZEXFIELD3, ZEXFIELD4, ZEXFIELD5) VALUES (#{werks}, #{matnr}, #{charg}, #{matnrInput}, #{chargInput}, #{lotNo}, #{maktx}, #{dispo}, #{ebeln}, #{ebelp}, #{aufnr}, #{bwart}, #{erfmg}, #{erfme}, #{lgort}, #{zexfield1}, #{zexfield2}, #{zexfield3}, #{zexfield4}, #{zexfield5})
mapper.update: UPDATE MS_SAP_INP_PFA_DTL SET LOT_NO = #{lotNo}, MTR_NM = #{maktx}, MRP_MNG = #{dispo}, PHS_ORDER_NO = #{ebeln}, PHS_ORDER_ITM = #{ebelp}, PDT_ORDER_NO = #{aufnr}, BWART = #{bwart}, ERFMG = #{erfmg}, ERFME = #{erfme}, LGORT = #{lgort}, ZEXFIELD1 = #{zexfield1}, ZEXFIELD2 = #{zexfield2}, ZEXFIELD3 = #{zexfield3}, ZEXFIELD4 = #{zexfield4}, ZEXFIELD5 = #{zexfield5} WHERE PLNT_CD = #{werks} AND MTR_CD = #{matnr} AND BATCH_NO = #{charg} AND INP_MTR_CD = #{matnrInput} AND INP_BATCH_NO = #{chargInput}
